level.heading: RIGHT TO CHALLENGE PRACTICABILITY AND NECESSITY TO PROTECT PUBLIC HEALTH ANDAFETY, IMMINENT THREAT, AND PREVENTION DEVICE DETERMINATIONS (ยง 21-5410)

level.text: The Owner of an identified property may contest any of the following determinations made by the General Manager:
Whether the installation of a backflow prevention device is practicable and necessary to protect the Portable Water System from contamination pursuant to ยง 5403.1 of this chapter;
Whether there is an imminent threat to the public health pursuant to ยง 5405.1 of this chapter; or
The type of preventive device determinations made by the General Manager pursuant to ยง 5403.2 of this chapter by following the procedures set forth in chapter 400 of this subtitle.
